speaker: President.
english:
President. The debate is closed.
The vote will take place on Tuesday, 16 May.
Written Statements (Rule 142)
original:
President. The debate is closed.
The vote will take place on Tuesday, 16 May.
Written Statements (Rule 142)
agenda_item: Monitoring the application of Community law (2003-2004) - Better lawmaking 2004: application of the principle of subsidiarity - The implementation consequences and impact of the internal market legislation in force - Strategy for the simplification of the regulatory environment (debate)
